trans-unit.resname: Q06·1 | Approach of the Second Sun | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Approach of the Second Sun
trans-unit.target: Approach of the Second Sun

trans-unit.resname: Q06·1 | Approach of the Second Sun | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If this spell was cast from your hand and you've cast another spell named CARDNAME this game, you win the game. Otherwise, put CARDNAME into its owner's library seventh from the top and you gain 7 life.
trans-unit.target: If this spell was cast from your hand and you've cast another spell named CARDNAME this game, you win the game. Otherwise, put CARDNAME into its owner's library seventh from the top and you gain 7 life.
